constituent: boil, someone, puppet, sooty, old man, sun, day, oven-fire, barbecue
koohiiStory1: I had a hard time with the next several frame numbers trying to use "puppet." So i thought of "voodoo doll" but then found "love doll" (which is just a special type of puppet) fit well with these 8 frames. Observe: Here I am boiling my love doll over the flames to warm her up a bit...
koohiiStory2: There is a lesser known voodoo practice of boiling a puppet over an oven fire, to really make your victim feel the heat!
readingExamples: 煮える (に.える), 煮やす (に.やす), 煮る (に.る)
